product_name: Adventure Paddleboarding All Rounder Stand Up Paddleboard - 10' 6"
long_description: This all-around paddleboard is well suited for flatwater cruising and it's also fun in the surf. A rounded shape makes it extra stable, delivering a board for beginners who want to hone their skills.
short_description: This all-around paddleboard is well suited for flatwater cruising and it's also fun in the surf. A rounded shape makes it extra stable, delivering a board for beginners who want to hone their skills.
